newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures hold higher ranges late.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures hold higher ranges late.

text.p: June 13 - U.S. stock index futures held at sharply higher levels but had carved out ranges late. Action thinned from brisk early pace, and some brokers said looked for sideways intraday work before Sept S&P 500 futures retry the upside. One chartist looked for a new peak near the 908.00 but said dip back below 903.30-85 would make the rise more labored.
